message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $95. I believe it's a great deal, what do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can make you an even better deal at $88 for the product. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest, but I can't go lower than $92 right now. I think it's a fair price considering the value you'll be getting.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I would like to propose $90 for the product. It's still a reasonable saving for me, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
